longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 6 months beyond the period of intended stay.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports. 
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Albania. 

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of a printed "Approved pre-enrolment" and a
   Registration Receipt , obtained via http://www.snedai.com,
  can obtain a visa on arrival at Abidjan (ABJ).
- Holders of an invitation letter issued by the authorities of
  Cote d'Ivoire prior to travel can obtain a visa on arrival.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of hotel accommodation
  and all documents required for their next destination.
Warning:
- All visitors arriving in Cote d'Ivoire are subject to
  screening and health checks. Passengers may be quarantined
  for further assessment
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever is required for all
passengers.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 9 months of age. 
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
